items.sentence: What\'s your favorite thing about the Christmas season?
More often than not, people believe what you tell them.
Tom played with the other children in the neighborhood.
Tom said there were three other Canadians at the party.
All Tom really wanted was a place to sit down and rest.
Do you know how many tourists come to Boston every day?
Tom said that the box was too heavy to lift by himself.
Tom says that he always enjoys playing cards with Mary.
Tom should take an umbrella because it looks like rain.
Tom spent a few years in Boston when he was in college.
